input.sentences: i was looking up a recipe and i decided to try to make some dim sum .
i bought all of the ingredients and began the process .
it took me a long time to make a single one .
afterward i cooked them and put them in the oven to stay warm .
when all my friends showed up i served them all some great food .
output.sentences: My husband and I have decided to cook dim sum tonight for our friends for dinner.
We were a little surprised to see how much work dinner was going to take once we had placed all the ingredients on the table.
Once my husband and I read the instructions, we began preparing the food and rolling the ingredients into the bread.
All that is left is to bake the food and prepare for dinner.
Our friends were very impressed at the dinner we had prepared and in the end all the work put in was worth it.
